name: Rollcage
description:
If you don't have PSX BIOS:  
- Open or create ~/.mednafen/firmware directory.  
- Make sure PSX BIOS files scph5500.bin, scph5501.bin, and scph5502.bin are there.

files.cue: N/A: Please select your Rollcage.cue file

files.bin: N/A: Please select your Rollcage.bin file

content:
files:
- cue: 'N/A: Please select your Rollcage.cue file'
- bin: 'N/A: Please select your Rollcage.bin file'
game:
  machine: psx
  main_file: cue
installer:
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: cue
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: bin
